text: If you would convince a man that he does wrong, do right. Men will believe what they see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: The law will never make a man free it is men who have got to make the law free.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Love is something far more than desire for sexual intercourse it is the principal means of escape from the loneliness which afflicts most men and women throughout the greater part of their lives.
author: Bertrand Russell

text: We know but a few men, a great many coats and breeches.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Instead of noblemen, let us have noble villages of men.
author: Henry David Thoreau
